content: ***what does salt do *** as an imbolc gift the salty ear/neck warmer is free through the month of february this is a complimentary companion piece to the salty hat this beginner friendly versatile knit easily shifts between being oversize ear warmers to a cowl/face covering depending on the weather and situation knit in soft blue sky fiber woolstok it will keep you warm and cozy no matter how cold it is even though the yarn is held double throughout it only uses one 50g skein 123 yards of main color and one 50g 123 g skein of counter color i used thermal spring for the mc and red rock for the cc any lofty woolen spun yarn will work well for this pattern but beware of super wash or worsted spun yarn because of the longish floats at the back if you wish to use a chunky weight yarn or two dk strands plus a strand of mohair that would also work included in the pattern are links to color work tubular cast on and tubular bind off this is a unisex garment finished dimensions are 22 in circumference and 6 wide stay safe friends
